title: Thomson 9A Series 80 cm (32 inch) HD Ready LED Smart Android TV  (32PATH0011)

product_specification.In The Box: 1N LED TV, 1N REMOTE, 1N MANUAL, 2N BATTERY, 1N WALLMOUNTING
product_specification.Supported Video Formats: MP4, MPEG, MPG, MKV, AVI, FLV, ASF
product_specification.Other Video Features: 8 Picture modes (Standard, Vivid, Soft, Sport, Movie, Monitor, Game, User), Color Temperature, DNR, HDMI
product_specification.Sound Mode: Standard, Music, News, Movie, Game, User
product_specification.Supported Audio Formats: MP3, MPEG1, MPEG2, MPEG2.5, AAC, HEAAC, ASF, WMA
product_specification.Other Audio Features: 6 Sound Mode (Standard, music, news, movie, game, user), Sound Output Device (TV Speaker, ARC, S/PDIF)
product_specification.Supported App - Others: Sony LIV, Zee5, Voot, HBO, Eros Now, MX Player TV, Alt Balaji, TVF, Jio Cinema, Tubi TV and Many More
product_specification.Content Providers: Google Play Movies & TV, Youtube, Prime Video
product_specification.Other Internet Features: More Than 5000 Plus Apps and Games Like Prime Video, Hotstar, Zee5, Sony LIV, Airplay, Built-in Chromecast, Google Play Store with 500,000 Plus TV Shows, Movies and Games, Google Assistant, Unlimited Content, 2.4 GHz Built-in WiFi
product_specification.Other Connectivity Features: Network PM44-11BP 100M Ethernet Support (10/100M, DHCP), Browser, Support HDMI-ARC
product_specification.Other Remote Control Features: Google Assistant Enabled Remote, Hot Keys of Prime Video, YouTube, Sony LIV, Sleek, Sylish and Smart Remote
product_specification.Other Convenience Features: Google Assistant, Lag Free Performance, Large Memory
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Warranty on Product & 6 Months on Accessories
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: Defect Arising Out of Faulty or Defective Material or Workmanship
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: The Product is Not Used According to Instructions given in the Instruction Manual. Defects Caused by Improper Use as Determined by the Company Personnel. Modification or Alteration of Any Nature is Made in the Electrical Circuitry or Physical Construction of the Set. Installation or Repair Work is Carried Out by Persons or Agency Other than Authorized by the Company. Site (Premises Where the Product is Kept) Conditions that do not Confirm to the Recommended Operating Conditions of the Machine. Original Serial Number is Removed, Obliterated or Altered from the Machine or Cabinet. Defects due to Cause Beyond Control Like Lightning, Abnormal Voltage, Acts of God or While in Transit to Service Centre or Purchaser's Residence. The Warranty does not Cover Any External Accessories (Such as Battery, Cable, Carrying Bag Etc). Dust appearing on television panel after 10 days of usage, mentioned in the Operating Instruction Manual Supplied with this Product or Any Cosmetic Parts
product_specification.Installation & Demo Details: We'll facilitate the installation and demo through authorized service engineer at your convenience The installation will be done within 48 hours of delivery of the TV. The service engineer will install your new TV, either on wall mount or on table top. Installation and demo are provided free of cost.The engineer will also help you understand your new TV's features.The process generally covers:Wall-mounted or table-top installation, as requested. Physical check of all ports, including power and USB ports. Accessories also checked.Demonstration of features and settingsQuick run-through on how to operate the TV

product_description.HD Quality: This TV offers you HD resolution, along with enhanced depth and natural colours and textures, to make for stunning visuals. You can also use it with an HD set-top box.
product_description.Android 9.0: The Android 9.0 operating system makes this TV as easy to use as your smartphone. In addition, it offers you a ton of different possibilities that come with an Android OS.

However the remote supplied with it got defective within one month. When I called up Jeeves's team to help with remote issue, I was told that the support was ONLY for TV and not for accessories provided along with it.
I then called up the toll free number provided on that TV manual but no body picked the phone. After waiting for 2 days and multiple tries to contact someone on the toll free number, I sent them mail stating my issue. Then I came to know that there is no on-site support provided by company for any issues with TV or accessories during warranty period or otherwise.

I was asked to provide video supporting my claim of defective remote so that it can be verified by support team whether it is really defective or not. After I had submitted the video and it was verified that my complaint was genuine, I was asked to sent remote to the company so that they can send me a replacement. This will result in me not able to watch TV till I get new remote from company. They have not even provided the time by which remote will be delivered to me.
This is really a pathetic support from the company and I would not recommend buying TV due to the same

Here is feature wise ratings of my 32" TV after 1 week of use.

1. Display - Although having only HD Ready display, this TV shows amazing colors and pure quality pictures. You can even watch 1080p quality videos smoothly if you have a strong wifi connection.

2. Sound - The sound quality is good, but if you need a movie or theater experience, then I would suggest you to buy a sound system and connect to this TV using bluetooth or ARC port.

3. Connectivity - Most of Android TVs with version 9 are facing connectivity issues. However, I have not faced any such issue. My TV gets connected to wifi quickly, just like a smartphone. Also, TV has bluetooth to connect wireless headphones, mobiles and other smart devices such as Google mini, Alexa. If you have VGA cable, you can connect laptop too. You can connect Play station or Xbox also.

4. Smart features - TV comes with built in chrome cast with only 1 drawback. Netflix app is not supported on this TV, hence the 4 stars rating. The default applications installed are Prime Video, Youtube ,Google Play Store, Google Play Music and many others. For using Netflix, we either have to connect mobile or laptop and cast screen to watch Netflix on TV.

5. Design - the TV looks good with such a low price, even better compared to others. It is easy to mount it on stand or wall mount as per your need.


The only problems you may face if the TV is damaged during delivery of the product. In that case, you can always return it and request for new one as it comes with 1 year warranty.

I'm writing this review 10 days after using the product. The Thomson 9A 32 inch TV is indeed very good. It's an Android TV with good looks, quick connectivity, nice sound (maybe little flat for music lovers) and a decent display for the price. I had to change my cable connection from SD to HD, in order to enjoy the real picture quality. The remote is very sleek & convenient too.

I surveyed a lot online, analyzed & compared many brands and then got this TV skeptically, as it is not among popular brands. But I'm happy with my purchase. And I must say Thomson has done a great job from the earlier B9 series 32 inch which my friend owns ! And thanks to Flipkart for quick delivery, smooth installation & demo by Jeeves the partner. Customer support from Flipkart for a few queries I had was also excellent. Thank you Thomson & Flipkart !!

This TV I bought to listen to music and use as monitor for secondary display.
Pros: 1. The TV display is bright with no edge bleeding and contrast is high.
2. SMART TV andriod is fast and responsive and easily connects to 5GHZ router speed (ACT)
3. The setting are easily understandable and connect to external devices like mobile for casting etc
4. You can connect multiple devices to the tv at the same time.
5. TV can be connected to PC to be used as monitor
6. Value for money

CONS: 1. You need to manually change display setting to get best results( change using user defined modes i kept (contrast at 100 brightness,sharpness at 50 ))
2. When you connect to PC you need to manually change the display setting and resolution in your PC to get usable display, can be used for watching multimedia and gaming
3. The remote is not very high quality however if you can install "SMart TV remote" andriod app you dont need to use the remote.
4. Sound is ok for the price however if you have sound bars like i do it doesnt matter

Conclusion: Value for money and display is very bright I dont think you can get this kind of display for this price

At this price Thomson and flipkart provide amazing product beyond the limit.....

Pros:
1. Amazing full HD screen quality and graphics production
2. Amazing sound output
3. Processor performance is also good
4. RAM management for apps is also great
5. Connectivity to other device is easy and fast
6. Cast screen working well
7. Voice assistant working amazingly

Suggestions:

Conclusion: Based on quality and price, buying Thomson Smart Android LED TV is worthy and satisfying......

Picture brightness is more than the required level. This can't be reduced for You tube and other wifi related videos. Whereas for the DTH connection, it can be altered.
Audio quality is superb, giving a powerful theatrical effect.
On installation, everything was perfect except no audio when connected to HDMI cable from Airtel HD extreme box as there was mismatch between the resolution. Later it was rectified.
Regarding the TV remote it is just for on & off, switch between inputs. You can't change the channels as other TV remotes are. So you must have the set top box remote side by side. It is a biggest drawback.
Not supporting Netflix is a big drawback.
Just within three months the reverse button of the remote is not working. For replacement I am fighting for more than 15 days, communicating via mails going on nearly 15 times, nothing fruitful. I was asked to produce video clips showing the defect in the remote which is ridiculous and too much. Instead of replacing it, I was advised to download the Android tv app in the mobile and to operate as a TV remote.
Customer care team is actually not supporting but dragging on the issue istead of resolving it.
Overall the perfomance is just okay.

Picture quality is great for the price. HD videos look particularly good. Perfect for bedrooms.
Connectivity was also very easy for everything. Casting was smooth. Voice commands work well for YouTube search.

Only drawback is not having Netflix. Even casting didn't work from the phone but i can live with it and sound quality although very loud could have been better.
